alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 5:23AM CST until January 04 at 5:45AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CST FOR DALE AND COFFEE COUNTIES... At 522 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Tyler Crossroads to 7 miles south of Elba, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Ewell, Roeton and Dale County Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
